name: Jiahuan Zhou
content: PKU-OV3 周嘉欢主页 HOMEPAGE LAB HOMEPAGE Zhou, Jiahuan（周嘉欢） Excellent Young Scientists Fund Program (Overseas) 国家级人才计划青年项目（海外）入选者, Peking University Boya Young Fellow 北京大学博雅青年学者, Wangxuan Institute of Computer Technology, Peking University. Beijing, China E-mail: jiahuanzhou@pku.edu.cn Jiahuan Zhou received his B.E. (2013) from Tsinghua University, and his Ph.D. degree (2018) in the Department of Electrical Engineering & Computer Science, Northwestern University. Currently, he is a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor at the Wangxuan Institute of Computer Technology, Peking University. His research interests include Computer Vision, Multi-modal Learning, and AI4Science. He has authored more than 60 papers in international journals and conferences including Nature Communications, Nature Synthesis, IEEE TPAMI, IJCV, IEEE TIP, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ICML, NeurIPS, ICLR, and so on. He serves as an Area Chair for CVPR, ICML, NeurIPS, ICLR, ICME, and ICPR, an Associate Editor of the Springer Journal of Machine Vision and Applications (MVA). 周嘉欢，北京大学王选计算机研究所研究员、助理教授、博士生导师，国家高层次青年人才，北京大学小米博雅青年学者。2013年本科毕业于清华大学自动化系，2018年博士毕业于美国Northwestern University计算机科学专业。主要研究方向为人工智能、多模态学习、AI4Science等，已发表Nature子刊、CCF-A和IEEE Trans论文六十余篇，包括、Nature Synthesis、Nature Communications、IEEE TPAMI、IJCV、IEEE TIP、CVPR、ICCV、ECCV、ICML、NeurIPS、ICLR等领域内顶级期刊和会议论文。主持包括国家自然科学基金优秀青年科学基金项目（海外）、国家自然科学基金面上项目、某基础加强技术领域基金、省部级重点支持项目、全国重点实验室开放基金、多项校企合作项目等。担任CCF-CV、CSF-VCS专委会委员，国际期刊Machine Vision and Applications编委、国际会议CVPR、ICML、NeurIPS、ICLR、ICME、ICPR领域主席，AAAI程序委员会委员。曾获北京大学青教赛（理工科）二等奖（2024年）、北京大学青教赛（理工科）最受学生欢迎奖（2024年）、北京大学“杨芙清-王阳元院士奖教金优等奖”（2025年），北京大学教学成果奖一等奖（2025年）。 News We are always actively recruiting Post-doc Fellows, Ph.D., Master, and Research Interns! Welcome to contact me with your detailed CV!
